20110104160145.000|20110104160147.000|TR0|Cancer researchers may have hit the 
20110104160147.000|20110104160150.000|TR0|jackpot.  A new blood test is being 
20110104160150.000|20110104160153.000|TR0|developed that is so precise, it can find 
20110104160153.000|20110104160155.000|TR0|a single cancer cell among billions of 
20110104160155.000|20110104160158.000|TR0|healthy ones.
20110104160158.000|20110104160201.000|TR0|
20110104160201.000|20110104160204.000|TR0|Senior Medical Correspondent Elizabeth 
20110104160204.000|20110104160206.000|TR0|Cohen is here to explain what this means 
20110104160206.000|20110104160209.000|TR0|for you.
20110104160209.000|20110104160212.000|TR0|
20110104160212.000|20110104160214.000|TR0|Just how does this thing work, Elizabeth?
20110104160214.000|20110104160217.000|TR0|
20110104160217.000|20110104160220.000|TR0|ELIZABETH COHEN, CNN SR. MEDICAL 
20110104160220.000|20110104160223.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  It's so different from the 
20110104160223.000|20110104160225.000|TR0|way that we detect cancer right now.  
20110104160225.000|20110104160228.000|TR0|Let's take breast cancer as an example.  
20110104160228.000|20110104160231.000|TR0|So, a woman has a mammogram.  That tumor 
20110104160231.000|20110104160234.000|TR0|has to be pretty sizeable for the 
20110104160234.000|20110104160236.000|TR0|radiologist to see it.  It has to be 
20110104160236.000|20110104160239.000|TR0|visible to the human eye.
20110104160239.000|20110104160242.000|TR0|
20110104160242.000|20110104160244.000|TR0|So, what this does, instead, is it looks 
20110104160244.000|20110104160247.000|TR0|in your blood for microscopic -- for, 
20110104160247.000|20110104160250.000|TR0|like, one cell of cancer.  So that's a 
20110104160250.000|20110104160253.000|TR0|completely different way of doing things.
20110104160253.000|20110104160255.000|TR0|
20110104160255.000|20110104160258.000|TR0|JOHNS:  So when would I get this test?
20110104160258.000|20110104160301.000|TR0|
20110104160301.000|20110104160303.000|TR0|COHEN:  Oh, you're not going to get it for 
20110104160303.000|20110104160306.000|TR0|five to 10 years, if ever.  And I feel 
20110104160306.000|20110104160309.000|TR0|like I don't want to be an Eeyore here, 
20110104160309.000|20110104160312.000|TR0|but I feel like I should add, there is a 
20110104160312.000|20110104160314.000|TR0|chance that this test is just never going 
20110104160314.000|20110104160317.000|TR0|to materialize.  I mean, that could happen.
20110104160317.000|20110104160320.000|TR0|
20110104160320.000|20110104160323.000|TR0|JOHNS:  All right.  We've been getting 
20110104160323.000|20110104160325.000|TR0|questions from viewers about this on the

20110104160339.000|20110104160342.000|TR0|
20110104160342.000|20110104160344.000|TR0|COHEN:  Right.  It's a great question,

20110104160412.000|20110104160414.000|TR0|cancer cell doesn't tell you what kind of 
20110104160414.000|20110104160417.000|TR0|cancer it is, where it is in your body,

20110104162434.000|20110104162437.000|TR0|coach Rex Ryan wants a piece of Peyton 
20110104162437.000|20110104162439.000|TR0|Manning and the Colts.  On Saturday, he 
20110104162439.000|20110104162442.000|TR0|will get his chance.  In six games against 
20110104162442.000|20110104162445.000|TR0|Ryan, coach team's (ph) Manning is 5-1 
20110104162445.000|20110104162448.000|TR0|with more than 1,500 yards, 12 touchdown 
20110104162448.000|20110104162450.000|TR0|passes, only two interceptions.
20110104162450.000|20110104162453.000|TR0|

20110104162456.000|20110104162458.000|TR0|victory in 14 years. We're talking about 
20110104162458.000|20110104162501.000|TR0|Andrew Luck here.  He's their quarterback, 
20110104162501.000|20110104162504.000|TR0|a Heisman Trophy runner-up, dominated 
20110104162504.000|20110104162507.000|TR0|Virginia Tech at the Orange Bowl. Luck 
20110104162507.000|20110104162509.000|TR0|threw 287 yards, four touchdowns, and a 
20110104162509.000|20110104162512.000|TR0|40-12 win.
20110104162512.000|20110104162515.000|TR0|
20110104162515.000|20110104162518.000|TR0|A year and a half after the death of 
20110104162518.000|20110104162520.000|TR0|Michael Jackson, a hearing that starts 
20110104162520.000|20110104162523.000|TR0|shortly will determine whether Jackson's 
20110104162523.000|20110104162526.000|TR0|doctor stands trial.
20110104162526.000|20110104162528.000|TR0|
20110104162528.000|20110104162531.000|TR0|(COMMERCIAL BREAK)
20110104162531.000|20110104162534.000|TR0|
20110104162534.000|20110104162537.000|TR0|JOHNS:  While Republicans focus on trying 
20110104162537.000|20110104162539.000|TR0|to repeal health care reform, new benefits 
20110104162539.000|20110104162542.000|TR0|from the law kick in this year.
20110104162542.000|20110104162545.000|TR0|
20110104162545.000|20110104162547.000|TR0|Preventive care like annual physicals and 
20110104162547.000|20110104162550.000|TR0|cancer screenings will now be covered for 
20110104162550.000|20110104162553.000|TR0|seniors on Medicare.  Insurance companies 
20110104162553.000|20110104162556.000|TR0|will be required to spend 80 to 85 percent 
20110104162556.000|20110104162558.000|TR0|of your health care premiums on medical 
20110104162558.000|20110104162601.000|TR0|care, not administrative costs.  And one 
20110104162601.000|20110104162604.000|TR0|change you may not like, money from 
20110104162604.000|20110104162607.000|TR0|flexible spending accounts can no longer 
20110104162607.000|20110104162609.000|TR0|be used for over-the-counter medication 
20110104162609.000|20110104162612.000|TR0|unless you have a prescription from your 
20110104162612.000|20110104162615.000|TR0|doctor.
20110104162615.000|20110104162617.000|TR0|
20110104162617.000|20110104162620.000|TR0|Another provision of the health care law 
20110104162620.000|20110104162623.000|TR0|will benefit seniors by shrinking the 
20110104162623.000|20110104162626.000|TR0|so-called doughnut hole.  Chief Medical 
20110104162626.000|20110104162628.000|TR0|Correspondent Sanjay Gupta explains what 
20110104162628.000|20110104162631.000|TR0|this means for Medicare prescription drug 
20110104162631.000|20110104162634.000|TR0|costs.
20110104162634.000|20110104162636.000|TR0|
20110104162636.000|20110104162639.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20110104162639.000|20110104162642.000|TR0|
20110104162642.000|20110104162645.000|TR0|DR. SANJAY GUPTA, CNN CHIEF MEDICAL 
20110104162645.000|20110104162647.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  The impact of this 
20110104162647.000|20110104162650.000|TR0|shrinking of the doughnut hole could be 
20110104162650.000|20110104162653.000|TR0|pretty significant for seniors.
20110104162653.000|20110104162656.000|TR0|
20110104162656.000|20110104162658.000|TR0|Think of it like this -- we talk about the 
20110104162658.000|20110104162701.000|TR0|doughnut hole a lot. Imagine a doughnut.  
20110104162701.000|20110104162704.000|TR0|As seniors are starting to first start 
20110104162704.000|20110104162706.000|TR0|paying for prescription drugs, as they go 
20110104162706.000|20110104162709.000|TR0|to the first part of the doughnut, they 
20110104162709.000|20110104162712.000|TR0|pay about a quarter, 25 percent of the 
20110104162712.000|20110104162715.000|TR0|cost of those prescription drugs.  As 
20110104162715.000|20110104162717.000|TR0|things stood, when they got to the hole, 
20110104162717.000|20110104162720.000|TR0|the middle part, they had to pay for all 
20110104162720.000|20110104162723.000|TR0|of the costs of prescription drugs, until 
20110104162723.000|20110104162725.000|TR0|they got to the other side of the hole, 
20110104162725.000|20110104162728.000|TR0|about $4,550, and that's when they started 
20110104162728.000|20110104162731.000|TR0|to get relief again.
20110104162731.000|20110104162734.000|TR0|
20110104162734.000|20110104162736.000|TR0|The impact of what's happening now is that 
20110104162736.000|20110104162739.000|TR0|the hole, the middle part, where they were 
20110104162739.000|20110104162742.000|TR0|paying for the entire cost of prescription 
20110104162742.000|20110104162745.000|TR0|drugs, now they will only have to pay for 
20110104162745.000|20110104162747.000|TR0|about 50 percent of the cost.  So, there 
20110104162747.000|20110104162750.000|TR0|you see how the impact of the doughnut 
20110104162750.000|20110104162753.000|TR0|hole is shrinking, and the size is 
20110104162753.000|20110104162755.000|TR0|shrinking as well.       The trajectory of 
20110104162755.000|20110104162758.000|TR0|this incident is that, ultimately, there 
20110104162758.000|20110104162801.000|TR0|should be no hole at all.  They're saying 
20110104162801.000|20110104162804.000|TR0|that there may be a cost for seniors all 
20110104162804.000|20110104162806.000|TR0|along, 25 percent of all costs of 
20110104162806.000|20110104162809.000|TR0|prescription drugs, but it doesn't change 
20110104162809.000|20110104162812.000|TR0|once you get to certain thresholds, and 
20110104162812.000|20110104162814.000|TR0|kick back in when you get to other 
20110104162814.000|20110104162817.000|TR0|thresholds.  That's the significance of 
20110104162817.000|20110104162820.000|TR0|what's happening today.
20110104162820.000|20110104162823.000|TR0|
20110104162823.000|20110104162825.000|TR0|(END VIDEOTAPE)

20110104162917.000|20110104162920.000|TR0|later, the cause of Michael Jackson's 
20110104162920.000|20110104162923.000|TR0|death is clear -- acute intoxication of 
20110104162923.000|20110104162925.000|TR0|Propofol, a powerful surgical sedative.  
20110104162925.000|20110104162928.000|TR0|But who caused the death remains the
